backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining file, folder, mission, and user profile types with authorization, storage mixins, and basic query/mutation methods including health checks and mission creation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like mapping of frontend file paths to short functional summaries for each component, hook, and utility.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing creation and validation of Draft baseline synced exactly to Live version 114 with detailed parity checks.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, favicons, PWA config, and loading the main React app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change-control notice declaring a code freeze after restoring Live version 114 until explicit user approval is given.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, theme, icons, and display settings for MyGallery.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, network-first fetch handling, and cache cleanup for the PWA.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying that all frontend files and behaviors match Live version 114, covering authentication, actor initialization, UI, styling, and utilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring theme and context providers and showing an intro screen after login.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing detailed error states for actor initialization with retry and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: React component rendering an animated target-style SVG icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Compact indicator showing backend connection or initialization status based on actor context.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed subtle bottom line used as a decorative UI element.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog prompting users to retry opening or download a file when a popup is blocked.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Displays a dialog for previewing files with support for images, video, PDFs, and Office docs, and provides actions like download, open externally, move, and delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file and link uploads with progress tracking, validation, and backend mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Renders a floating button that opens the folders dialog, with disabled and hover states.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Displays a dialog for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting folders with swipe actions and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen viewer for navigating files with swipe gestures and actions like delete, download, share, move, and open externally.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays a gallery of files with selection, long‑press behavior, file actions, and integration with the full‑screen viewer.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with theme toggle, authentication dropdown, connectivity indicator, and progress bar.
frontend/src/components/InternetIdentity: Fallback screen offering retry, login, and reload actions when Internet Identity initialization times out.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Intro animation screen displaying a welcome message and transitioning to the app after animation completes.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link cannot open, offering retry and copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button triggering Internet Identity login with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission detail editor supporting task editing, file viewing, progress tracking, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title entry and task management.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions interface.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen mission list with creation, deletion, and selection navigation to mission details.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Layout wrapper that displays content only in mobile-oriented view.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for selecting a mission and moving selected file IDs into it, with loading states and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog that lets users move files into folders or back to the main collection, handling loading and mutations.
Swipeable row component that reveals edit/delete actions using pointer gesture handling and controlled open state.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Global upload progress bar that shows total progress and item count when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with branding graphics and login entry point for the app.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Context managing backend actor initialization with retries, error handling, and identity changes.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Context tracking upload batches, progress updates, and completion for file and link uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializationTime: Tracks whether an initialization process exceeds a timeout and provides a reset function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout helpers, and loads stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer like touch input.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating files and folders through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper for merging class names with Tailwind utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main app page controlling authentication state, folder and mission dialogs, data fetching, and optional dev smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines actor initialization error messages and helpers for classifying backend and token-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides utilities for opening URLs in new tabs with popup-block detection and downloading files via blob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME type, including viewer support, downloads, and Office previews.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Classifies MIME types into preview categories and returns human-readable file type labels.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Developer utilities for inspecting React Query cache state and logging mutation lifecycles for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Implements an automated smoke test that creates folders, missions, uploads files, and verifies results via backend APIs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helper functions to read URL parameters (including hash routing) and persist them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors, radius, animations, and enabling plugins for typography and animations.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical file list enumerating all frontend files that define the Live version 114 baseline for parity validation.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the current fix request, known issues, and existing feature requirements for resolving an indefinite loading state.
